original_title: Significant increase in afternoon thunderstorms likely
original_body_lines: COLOMBO (News 1st) – The Department of Meteorology predicts a significant increase in thunderstorms during the afternoon hours.
Showers or thundershowers will occur at several places over most parts of the country after 2 PM.
Heavy showers above 100 mm are likely at some places in Western, Sabaragamuwa, Central, North-Western and Southern provinces.
Showers or thundershowers may also occur in the Eastern province and in Mullaitivu and Hambanthota districts during the morning.
